Scrambled and boiled eggs, cereals, bread for toast, rolls, jam,butter,cold meats, cheese, wine!, juices, tea and coffee. Ate in the cafe when we got there - ok if you are too tired to go elsewhere. Staff friendly enough, chap on reception quite helpful when I got my purse stolen - take care - even if you are sure you are being careful, as I was, they still get you. Do use the Bus Touristic - fab value and take you everywhere you need. Also ate at the Hard Rock Cafe - brilliant all round. Good value, good service, great food, and great place.Had a good time, despite my purse being stolen, which could have ruined it, as it was my birthday money! Great position for hotel, as just off Las Ramblas which is absolutley packed all the time, so being just round the corner is ideal. Also with Cataluyna Sqaure being at the end of the road this is useful as all the bus routes stop here, including the Bus Touristic. If you do choose this hotel, you should not be disappointed - not luxurious, but very clean, food ok, staff pleasant, and free internet access from 7am to 11pm.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location Very clean”
Reviews.Author: Babinos
Reviews.Content: I went for 4 days in Barcelona staying at the Hotel Lleo with my girlfriend. We’ve booked it from their web site as it had the same or cheapest rates from any other booking website. Was the best location for sightseeing, is located less than 200m away from Plaza Catalunya top of La Rambla. The room we had, was very clean and good size and the staff was very friendly. We didn’t have breakfast or any meals there as there are plenty of places around. We have a very pleasant stay. A definite value for money hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fab Hotel, for the 2nd year!”
Reviews.Author: jazzybabe34
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd vist to this fab hotel, Just a 20 min bus ride on the Airport bus cost 3.90 Euro's each can be found out the terminal exit to your right. It terminates at Plaza Catalunya Taxi is 30 Euro's! When you get off the bus hotel can be found straight accross the middle square, accross the crossing you will see the hotel at the top of the street if you keep going. We had a twin room at the front of the hotel which we asked for and the hotel kindly obliged. Our friends each had a double with a spa bath at the back of the hotel, they were more than pleased too. The hotel is spotless, friendly and has a good choice at breakfast, if you want a change you can try the many restaurants in the city, too many to mention really except, we had a great meal at QU restaurant off the square and there is a great tapas bar out the hotel turn left on the corner of the second steet on the right. Very cheap too. Please buy a 2 day ticket on the tourist bus, you can use it as a taxi hop on and off when you want. it is about £18 each but it's worth it and you get discounts off entrance fees to most attractions. Or use the metro, it's so easy to use and very clean. Don't leave your shopping until the Sunday as 95% of shops are shut except the ones in the Mall at the Harbour. Visit the park Guell, La Paredara, Segrada la Familia, food market off the Rambla and the port. Have a great trip, i've been to Barcelona 5 times now ,but I will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “December sunshine”
Reviews.Author: Richjules
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 5 nights at the Hotel Lleo taking in the New Year celebrations. Great location, very clean with friendly helpful staff. Although we had an internal room with no windows it proved to be quieter than others facing the street. Barcelona was very busy at this time of year, but you can find quieter spots by moving away from the Ramblas. A must see sight is the inside of the Sagrada Familia, especially with sun coming through the stained glass windows. Beautiful!!

Reviews.Title: “Good overall”
Reviews.Author: walana
Reviews.Content: Perfect location, rooms on the small side but adequate and Id booked a superior room so hate to see the normal sized ones! Advertisement of a jacuzzi in the room was a disappointment and nothing but a bath with bubble options - a tight squeeze for 2!! Breakfast a rip off. However location does win overall.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hotel”
Reviews.Author: carly20
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend stayed here end of july and what a great hotel it was, we was a bit worried because we had seen some reviews which didnt seem to good.Staff were friendly and talk quite good English we had requested a room at the front of the hotel which we got and although there was a noisy road out the front with the doors closed you couldnt really hear any of it and with the room having airconditioning you didnt really need the doors open anyway. Our room was very clean and quite big we also had electric beds which was quite fun.Overall we thought this hotel was very good it was lovely and clean and in a great location,lovely rooms and helpful staff even the breakfast was nice. We will def be staying at this hotel again in the future. One last thing we would like to recommend the website checkin2 which is where we booked our accomdation from they were very helpful when you ring up and its easy to book over the internet and was by far the cheapest place to book for accomadation only (well thats whats we found anyway).

Reviews.Title: “Perfect but Noise at the Back”
Reviews.Author: simonerudd
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic location! A 2 min walk to Plaza Cataluna and The Ramblas. Have just come back from a 3 night stay. Got the Aerobus from the airport to Plaza Cataluna, only 3.50 euros! Then a short and very easy walk to the hotel. The staff on arrival were ok. Friendly enough. Free wireless internet access and the safe cost 2.50 euros a day. The room we had was a twin at the back of the building. Spacious with two over sized single beds. We even had a little gadget to raise the head of the beds!! (not to sure how useful that is though). The decor was a bit woodchip, but had been painted fairly recently and was amazingly clean. I wasn't expecting any more from a three star hotel. I have stayed in hundreds that were much much worse. The bathroom although not a sparkling new as a higher grade hotel was also very very clean. Marble everywhere. Had a very powerful shower with no problems with hot water. The room had wooden floors which were thoroughly cleaned every day, along with the sheets and towels being changed. Breakfast was a fairly typical spanish hotel buffet but was served till 12pm, which is great for those who fancy a late morning..... which brings me on to my only criticism. There were major building works going on behind the hotel which were very noisy from about 9am onwards so if you are travelling within the next few months, I would try and get a room at the front. Overall though, we thought this was an excellent little hotel and for the location and the price, couldn't have asked for more!

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT HOTEL AND GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: billyork
Reviews.Content: My wife and I together with two friends spent four days here in March. For the price I would say it was exceptionally good value. The breakfast was plentiful and if you did not like Spanish food,the meals in the restaurant of an evening were certainly to our liking. Our rooms on the third floor overlooked the main street but the balcony window kept out any noise.The location is great with numerous shops,bars and coffee shops on your doorstep and Las Ramblas a five minute walk away. I would definately rate this hotel as deserving of more than a 3 star rating

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE view!!”
Reviews.Author: queenangel2
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a week in late June 2005 with my boyfriend. The lobby area, although small, seemed nice and clean. Our room was extremely small for a one week stay. We had one very small window which had a view of a wall which was literally 4ft away from the window. We straight away asked to be moved but the hotel was full. The room was clean and the sheets were changed daily. The bathroom was lovely and the shower was very powerful. Lovely breakfast and I was very pleased to find there was free internet access, as at the time of my stay I was checking the web daily to get the results of my final university exams. Fantastic location but we drew a very short straw over our room!
